name: WebGLRenderingContext.getContextAttributes
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.getContextAttributes() method returns a WebGLContextAttributes object that contains the actual context parameters. Might return null, if the context is lost.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'WebGLRenderingContext.getContextAttributes' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.
